comment: This was an extremely boring class with too much, time consuming work. However, the class was super easy and an easy A. Dr. Fuller is really nice and willing to help you. I have heard she is one of the better professors to take for this course!

This class was pointless & a waste of time. Many useless & tedious assignments. She isn't confident in what she's "teaching" & is super awkward. Do nothing in class & then expected to do a study guide, portfolio entry & lesson plan. Can be confusing with directions, but rubrics for everything. Easy A, though.
